post:
I'd bought this OVH dedicated server subscription from a LET member here last month. Due to personal reasons (higher education), I will not be able to play with the server and am looking to sell this to someone over here.

**Specs:**

`Intel(R) Atom(TM) CPU N2800   @ 1.86GHz
HDD 1TB
2GB RAM
100 Mbit Unmetered network
4 IPv4`

It is paid for till 1st October.

Monthly recurring dedicated server cost: €16.49 (without VAT)
Asking price: €17.5 

Mode of payment: Paypal invoice payment.
If someone's interested, PM me. 

This is a Kumsufi 2012 server, which can be resold to customers outside EU countries as per OVH. I myself am residing in India, and have removed VAT from the billing for me.
